shopifyPage.title: Request a Demo
shopifyPage.body:
Thank you for your interest in Motic Instruments. 

Looking to demo one of our products? 

Feel free to send us a request for demo at sales@motic-america.com. Our support team will respond to demo requests in 1-2 business days. In your email include the following information:

  • Name
  • Phone#
  • Email
  • Company/Institution
  • Shipment Address
  • Item / Part # /Quantity (if known)
  • What do you need to view with the microscope?

If you are submitting a purchase order, please send them to sales@motic-america.com
